title: Hilarious moment man agrees to have his nose waxed but needs some persuading to pull out the strips
text:
This is the hilarious moment a man screams in pain and laughs with his partner as he cannot bring himself to pull out some wax strips from his nose.

In footage that has recently appeared online, the man can be seen holding some strips while a woman puts the wax in his nostrils.

'That's gonna be violent,' he says, as observer Natasha Willocks tells him that she is recording the scene.

A woman, pictured left and right, uses wooden sticks to spread the wax in the man's nostrils

The man screams in pain as he cannot bring himself to pull the wax strips out of his nostrils

He asks his partner to hurry up while she places the wax in his nose and he holds the white strips.

The hilarious clip shows the pair laughing as the man's nostrils are full of wax but he cannot find the courage to pull them out.

At some point, the person recording the video says: 'I am not staying here for 10 minutes!'

As the video zooms in, the woman tries to move some wooden sticks with which she spread the wax, but the scared man screams in pain.

After about three minutes, he finally finds the courage to pull the wax strips out of his nose

When she tries to lift the strips up, he moves her hands away and screams in a mixture of swearing and laughter.

'Why did you told me to do this?' he asks while he tries to remove the wooden sticks from his nostrils.

At some point, the woman counts down 'one, two, three', expecting her partner to pull out the strips, but the two end up laughing again.

'Go on,' the woman says, but he tells her he cannot do it.

At the end of the clip, the person filming zooms in to show the man's waxed nostrils

Even Ms Willocks asks him whether he wants her to pull the strips, but he tells her he will do it.

After another countdown, he finally manages to pull out the wooden sticks and the wax strips, screaming 'f***ing hell!'.

The woman then zooms in to show his waxed nostrils and a girl tells the man that his nose is bleeding.
description: After screaming in a mixture of swearing and laughter for three minutes, the British man finally manages to pull the wax strips out of his nostrils as his partner tries to help him.
